name: The Invasion (JUSXTREME96)
description:
You are a Cyborg Cop on a Journey to destroy the Army of Foreign species. Fight for Justice and Peace in your World. Get to the end of this level while dodging bullets. Defeat the final boss. 

Controls

Arrow Keys - Move

Left Ctrl - Shoot

Left Alt - Jump

Space - Dash

Alt + F4 - Quit

Credits

Justice Garcia - Graphics & Sound

Edward Tavarez - Level Design

Erick Evangeliste - Programming
